string.name: native_body
string.description: This string appears within a window that describes an ad's contents. It indicates that the following text would be the body field (textual content) of the native ad. [CHAR_LIMIT=NONE]

string.name: native_headline
string.description: This string appears within a window that describes an ad's contents. It indicates that the following text would be the headline field (title) of the native ad. [CHAR_LIMIT=NONE]

string.name: native_media_view
string.description: This string appears within a window that describes an ad's contents. It indicates that the following image / video would be the media view field (graphical content) of the native ad. [CHAR_LIMIT=NONE]

string.name: notifications_permission_confirm
string.description: Label on the button to go to settings. [CHAR_LIMIT=20]

string.name: notifications_permission_decline
string.description: Label on the button to decline going to settings. [CHAR_LIMIT=20]

string.name: notifications_permission_title
string.description: Body of the dialog presented when an ad wants to grant notifications permission. [CHAR_LIMIT=NONE]

resources.string: Allow app to send you notifications?

string.name: offline_notification_text
string.description: Text of the notification which directs the user to the landing page of the ad. [CHAR_LIMIT=NONE]

string.name: offline_notification_title
string.description: Title of the notification which directs the user to the landing page of the ad. [CHAR_LIMIT=NONE]

resources.string: View the ad you saved when you were offline

string.name: offline_opt_in_confirm
string.description: Label on the button to opt in to a notification later when the user is back online. [CHAR_LIMIT=12]

string.name: offline_opt_in_confirmation
string.description: Confirmation text displayed when the user opts in to get a notification. [CHAR_LIMIT=NONE]

resources.string: You\'ll get a notification with the link when you\'re back online

string.name: offline_opt_in_decline
string.description: Label on the button to decline to get a notification later when the user is back online. [CHAR_LIMIT=12]

string.name: offline_opt_in_message
string.description: Body of the dialog presented when an ad is clicked while offline. [CHAR_LIMIT=NONE]

resources.string: We\'ll send you a notification with a link to the advertiser site.

string.name: offline_opt_in_title
string.description: Title of the dialog presented when an ad is clicked while offline. [CHAR_LIMIT=NONE]

resources.string: Open ad when you\'re back online.
"Allow Ad to store image in Picture gallery?"
Allow Ad to create a calendar event?

string.name: watermark_label_prefix
string.description: This string appears within a watermark on video ads for debugging. [CHAR_LIMIT=NONE]
